original_text: Some people continue patiently to do good things. They want to do what is right so that God will praise them. They want to live the kind of life which death will not spoil. God will cause people like that to live with him always.
korean_text: 참고 선을 행하여 영광과 존귀와 썩지 아니함을 구하는 자에게는 영생으로 하시고

sentences.original_text: They want to do what is right
so that God will praise them
They want to live the kind of life
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그런 종류의 삶을 살기 원합니다

sentences.original_text: God will cause people like that

sentences.korean_translation: 항상 그와 함께 살게 하실 것입니다
